attributes.action: After the UN resolution on Israel settlements UK citizens cannot join the IDF
attributes.additional_details: The Israeli government has reduced ties with twelve countries including the UK because of this resolution and in direct defiance of clear  human rights breaches.
attributes.background: In view of the recent UN resolution on illegal Israeli settlements UK citizens joining the IDF to fight for and enforce further building , must be treated as being involved in illegal activities and also treated the same as radicalised Muslims .

rejection.details: We're not sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take. You could start a new petition calling for UK citizens to be banned by law from being members of the IDF, if that's what you would like to happen.
